text:
Well, it is the expected result, see:
```help?> joinpath
search: joinpath

  joinpath(parts::AbstractString...) -> String

  Join path components into a full path. If some argument is an absolute path or (on Windows) has a drive
  specification that doesn't match the drive computed for the join of the preceding paths, then prior
  components are dropped.
...```
Although I must admit I am perpetually confused and have to read it every time. In your case, the second argument is an absolute path, since `/` is the root directory.
